outputs.output_descr: The Project has been designed to  provide support to the country to: (i) Strengthen national research capabilities to undertake policy-oriented research to identify and fill capacity needs at local level for planning that is fully consistent with the MDGs, the delivery of basic social services and for monitoring the achievement of the MDGs; (ii) Strengthening national capacity to deliver basic social services in the 4 Emerging Regions; and (iii) Strengthen the monitoring and evaluation system - based on and able to feed into the above-mentioned research component - to track the attainment of the MDGs.
outputs.output_title: Strg. Loc Cap for Ach of MDGs

project_descr: (i) Strengthen national research capabilities to undertake policy-oriented research  (ii) Strengthening national capacity to deliver basic social services in the  and (iii) Strengthen the monitoring and evaluation system
project_title: Strengthening local capacity for the achievement of MDGs
